SEARCH
Package org.polimi.client

Class RMIClient

java.lang.Object
org.polimi.client.Client
org.polimi.client.RMIClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Remote, RMICallback
public class RMIClient extends Client implements RMICallback
messages has to be sent in the right order, because they will be executed by the client in the same order they have been sent (the same thing happen in SocketClient)

    • getClientController

    • startConnection

      public boolean startConnection()
      search the server using RMI registry and if the server is found set the boolean connected to true
      Returns:
      true if connection is established, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException
      NotBoundException

    • loginGui

      public boolean loginGui(String username) throws RemoteException
      calls login method of the server. if the return value is ALREADY_USED, the client is asked to choose another if the return value is OK the RMI client object is created and given to the server using subscribe method in this case is also started the decrementer thread
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • login

      public void login() throws RemoteException, AlreadyBoundException, NotBoundException
      Throws:
      RemoteException
      AlreadyBoundException
      NotBoundException

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(Message message) throws RemoteException
      Performs the login process by choosing a username and communicating with the server. Throws a RemoteException if there is an error in the remote method invocation. Continues the login process until a unique username is chosen. If the chosen username is already taken, it notifies the client controller. If the internal communication indicates a reconnection, it notifies the client controller, exports the client object as an RMI callback stub, and invokes the server's reconnection method. If the internal communication indicates a successful login, it notifies the client controller, exports the client object as an RMI callback stub, subscribes to the server, and starts a new thread for decrementing the countDown value.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in the remote method invocation.

    • chooseUsername

      public void chooseUsername()
      this method calls clientController method chooseUsername and sets the username of this client to the username in the message returned by chooseUsername.

    • ifConnected

      public boolean ifConnected()

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • getNotified

      public void getNotified() throws RemoteException
      this method is called by the server when a message is sent to the client it adds the message to the message queue and starts a new thread that waits on taskLock to be free and then calls handleMessage method of the clientController and in case of a message to be sent to the server it sends this message.
      Specified by:
      getNotified in interface RMICallback
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • ping

      public void ping()
      Specified by:
      ping in interface RMICallback

    • decrementCountDown

      public void decrementCountDown()
      Decrements the countDown value and checks if it reaches zero. If the countDown value reaches zero, it indicates lost communication with the server and calls the disconnect method to handle the disconnection.

    • receiveChatMessage

      public void receiveChatMessage(String message) throws RemoteException
      Specified by:
      receiveChatMessage in interface RMICallback
      Throws:
      RemoteException
